name: Subject 89 - Jaxson V.

sections.title: SUBJECT IDENTIFICATION
sections.text:
Name:           Jaxson V.
Designation:    Subject 89
Blood Type:     Type-H (Synthetic)
DOB:            2127-03-15
Status:         DEFECTIVE
Expiration:     Cycle 30 (Estimated)

sections.title: GENETIC MARKERS
sections.text:
Lattice Pattern:    PRESENT (Iris)
Organ Viability:    DEGRADED
Timebomb Status:    ACTIVE
Suppressant Req:    YES (Bio-Dyne Pure)

NOTE: Subject shows accelerated decay following
      cessation of water treatment program.

sections.title: ACCESS LOG
sections.text:
2142-08-22 03:14:07 - MAINTENANCE ACCESS GRANTED
2142-08-22 03:14:12 - VENT CONTROL: REVERSAL AUTHORIZED
2142-08-22 03:14:15 - USER 89 LOGGED OUT

[FLAGGED: Unusual access pattern detected]
[FLAGGED: Ventilation reversal preceded gas event]

sections.title: NOTES
sections.text:
Subject 89 was granted maintenance access at age 15
for janitorial duties. Access chip #4092 issued.

POST-INCIDENT: Subject survived liquidation event.
Current whereabouts: UNKNOWN
Recommendation: No action required. Timebomb will
                resolve within 15 years.

gmNotes: This is THE revelation document. It proves Jax authorized the ventilation reversal that enabled the gas attack. The timestamps and access logs are damning. Players who read this will understand Jax's guilt.
